title: 格式错乱中心页
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]] [[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]] [[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]] [[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]] [[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]] [[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source start=-- |name=全体贡献者 |no-right-margin=*]] 本中心页的大部分内容都由 [[*user Henzoid]]、[[*user Tstaffor]] 以及 [[*user TopDownUnder]] 作成。 感谢你，也同样感谢以下人士对格式错乱 SCP 描述的建议：[[*user LAN 2D]] 与 [[*user Croquembouche]]。 [[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:author-label-source end=--]] [[module CSS]] @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Mystery+Quest'); .lie{ margin: 1px; background-color: hsla(207, 75%, 50%, .3); word-break: unset; font-family: var(--mono-font); } :root { --swatch-primary: 187, 0, 17; } .story { clear: both; border: 3px black solid; padding: calc(20px - 1em) 0 20px 0; } .story p, .choices { margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px; } .choices { clear: both; } .choices p { clear: both; margin: 0; margin-top: 0.5rem; } span, a { word-break: normal !important; } /* Improved arrow CSS by EstrellaYoshte */ /* thank you estrella! */ .choices a { width: max-content; max-width: 70%; background-color: transparent; padding: 3px 6px; position: relative; display: block; z-index: 0; --border-thickness: 0.0625rem; clip-path: polygon(0 -5%, 130% -5%, 130% 105%, 0 105%); border-left: var(--border-thickness) solid rgb(var(--swatch-primary)); } .choices a::before, .choices a::after { content: ""; position: absolute; height: 50%; width: 116%; display: block; z-index: -1; left: 0; box-sizing: border-box; border: solid var(--border-thickness) rgb(var(--swatch-primary)); border-left-width: 0; border-right-width: calc(var(--border-thickness)*1.35); } .choices a::before { top: 0; transform: skew(35deg); border-bottom-width: 0; } .choices a::after { bottom: 0; transform: skew(-35deg); border-top-width: 0; } .no { color: transparent; } .no::selection { color: #FF6666; } .sel em { color: transparent; font-style:normal; } .sel em::selection { color: #FF6666; } .sel span[style*="text-decoration: underline;"]{ text-decoration: none !important; } .sel span[style*="text-decoration: underline;"]::selection { color: #FF6666; background: rgba(var(--swatch-primary,180,35,35),.25) !important; } .sel-before { z-index: 0; position: absolute; } .sel-before::selection { color: transparent; } .sel-after-r::selection { color: #FF6666; } .sel-after-b { z-index: 1; position: absolute; color: transparent; } .sel-after-b::selection { color: rgb(var(--swatch-text-general)); } .sel-blank{ visibility: hidden; } div.jgterminal{ border: 1px solid pink; border: solid 3px #ff94b4; border-radius: 16px; background-color: #ffb0d0; /* black shadow at the top of the jgterminal */ background-image: radial-gradient(ellipse 1000% 100% at 50% 90%, transparent, #ffedf5); background-position: center; display: block; /* shadow around the jgterminal */ box-shadow: inset 0 0 10em 1em rgba(252,217,231,0.96); /* prevents scanline from forming a scrollwheel */ overflow:hidden; } div.jgterminal blockquote { background-color: #fff2f7; border: double 3px #ff94b4 } div.jgscanline{ margin-top: -40%; width: 100%; height: 60px; position: relative; pointer-events: none; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */ -webkit-animation: scan 12s linear 0s infinite; /* You may need to change this. If the bar goes by too quickly, increase 5s. */ animation: scan 12s linear 0s infinite; /* Same as above */ background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(56, 112, 82,0), rgba(56, 112, 82,0.1)) !important; } div.jgtext{ color: rgba(148,0,108,1); padding-left: 2em; padding-right: 2em; padding-top: 40%; font-family: monospace; font-size: 1.2em; } /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */ @-webkit-keyframes scan{ from{ transform: translateY(-10%);} to{ transform: translateY(5000%);} /* You may need to change this depending on the length of your terminal. If the scanline stops halfway, increase the second number.*/ } @keyframes scan{ from{ transform: translateY(-10%);} to{ transform: translateY(5000%);} /* Same as above.*/ } div.jgtext a:hover { color: #131; text-decoration: underline; background-color: #ff6392; padding: 1px; } div.jgtext a:hover::before{ content: "> "; } .email {border: solid 2px #000000; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)} [[/module]] [[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/format-screw-hub/format_screw_hub.png]] = [[size 60%]]**译注：**screw 亦作螺丝之意，所以本中心页的版头图为一根螺丝。[[/size]] [[table class="wiki-content-table"]] [[row]] [[hcell]] +++ 项目编号 [[/hcell]] [[hcell]] +++ 格式错乱描述 [[/hcell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell colspan="2"]] + 001 提案 [[/hcell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ [[[dr-gears-s-proposal|Dr. Gears 的提案]]] @@ @@ [[/cell]] [[cell]] 写于 SCP 文件标准化之前。 [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ [[[not-a-seagull-proposal|notgull 的提案]]] @@ @@ [[/cell]] [[cell]] [https://www.wikidot.com/account SCP-001] 喜爱阅读自己。 [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ [[[jack-ike-s-proposal-i|Meta Ike 的提案]]] @@ @@ [[/cell]] [[cell]] SCP-0001 为对生物力学设备造物的追溯性伪造所生成的物体。由于纸张的梦幻感，细节变得非常干净及朦胧。 [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ [[[mcdoctorate-s-proposal|McDoctorate 的提案]]] @@ @@ [[/cell]] [[cell]] [[span class="sel"]][[span class="sel-before"]]SCP-00//1// 为//一//种影响//首位//概今的异常。其被通过消灭//首位//的概今而收容。[[/span]][[span class="sel-after-b"]]SCP-00__1__ 为__一__种影响__首位__概__念__的异常。其被通过消灭__首位__的概__念__而收容。[[/span]][[span class="sel-blank"]]SCP-00//1// 为//一//种影响//首位//概今的异常。[[/span]][[/span]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ [[[Pedantique-s-Proposal|]]] @@ @@ [[/cell]] [[cell]] [[collapsible show="[数据删除]" hide="[数据删除]"]] 你盯着屏幕，希望看到什么有意思的东西。什么都没有？什么都没有。只有一堆删节。你失望地叹了口气，准备回到中心页。在最后一刻，当你的光标停留在浏览器标签的叉号上时，你注意到页面底部有一个链接。 [[[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/pedantique-s-proposal/Fishhook%20Aggregate%20Excessive%20%28rev24%29.html | 点开它。]]] SCP [[/hcell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ [[[SCP-3]]] @@ @@ [[/cell]] [[cell]] SCP-3[[footnote]]好耶，它现在是整个列表的第一位了。——O5-14[[/footnote]]己[[footnote]]本来就该是这样，因为它是按数字顺序排列的。  ——O5-29 [[/footnote]]被列于此中心页[[footnote]]因为 O5-29 根本就不关心泄密问题 ——O5-3[[/footnote]]因为**某人**认为它很重要。 ——O5-17[[footnote]] 用脚注吐槽之前能不能先把插入位置这一块弄明白 ——O5-14[[/footnote]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[cell]] @@ @@ 此外，您已因在论坛上进行角色扮演而收到一份警告。请勿再犯。

SCP-4455-Ω，反过来说……哦天，我要从哪开始描述这家伙？他称自己为解说者，幻想着自己是个什么蒙面恶棍。他还老是在最为细碎的事情上继续说个没完。靠，我还记得有一次它跟我们讲了//几个小时//他想要做的几个三明治。那三明治里面还只有金枪鱼和蛋黄酱！你怎么能这样聊三明治聊//那么//久的？我发誓，你可以问问他天空是什么颜色，他会给你来一段比圣经还长的演讲！这难道不是什么怪异的叙事危害吗？
